dcterms:description: The skeleton animation data consists of CSV files containing the three-dimensional coordinates of each joint depicted in the skeleton over time. Each sample can be seen as an array of 3 Ã— n + 1 columns and t rows, where n is the number of joints in the skeleton and t is the duration of the movement.
dcterms:title: MocapLab Skeleton Data

dcterms:description: A large dataset of RGB, depth, and segmented images with object class and position labels, containing more than 124,000 data samples distributed across 53 object classes.
dcterms:title: RGB-D Object Dataset
